Sonam in Colplay’s new song

So, how will we see Sonam Kapoor than as ‘Neerja’ this season? The 30-year-old Bollywood beauty is all set for her cameo in the British band Coldplay’s next single ‘Hymn For The Weekend’. The song also features Beyonce, reports the Express Tribune .

Expressing her excitement in being part of Coldplay’s seventh album, ‘A Head Full of Dreams’, the Khoobsurat actor said, “I love Coldplay’s music and so does the world. It was a huge honour to be a part of the video. It’s a great concept and I had a lot of fun shooting for it.” Sonam is reported to play a mystical muse in the video directed by Ben Mor. — ANI
title: Sonam Kapoor to star beside Beyonce in Coldplay's next
